description: Scale ca. 1:5,000. Title pasted on verso. Shows city walls, fortresses with watch towers, villages, temples, houses, and roads of Baode Zhou in Shanxi Province. Relief shown pictorially. Pictorial map. Pen-and-ink and watercolor. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Includes red labels which indicates place names, points of interest, and distance between places. Previous call number: G7823.B3A5 1820 .B3 Vault AACR2

notes: Shows city walls, fortresses with watch towers, villages, temples, houses, and roads of Baode Zhou in Shanxi Province.
